summary_of_book.label: 128² rails v0.2.3
summary_of_book.description:
chunk-aligned LHD rail system for 11-long trains.
by the AssemblyStorm server crew 
v0.2.3 | 19/november/2023

[color=#ff8000]taxi sez:[/color] [color=yellow]only YOU can prevent congestion![/color]
[color=#FFFF00]• Plan and organize the rail network so that the number of intersections decreases as expected traffic increases:[/color] 
[color=yellow]- high traffic areas should have just a few spread-apart intersections; 
- low traffic areas can have several close-by intersections.[/color]

6.label: [color=blue]2[/color]to[color=purple]4[/color] [color=red]switch[/color]
6.description:
[color=#FFFF00]Can be overlaid on a "[/color][color=blue]2trk[/color] straight[color=#FFFF00]".[/color]
send your symmetry related complaints to: myass@fuckrightoff.co.uk

7.label: 2K penalty [color=red]switch[/color]
7.description:
[color=#FFFF00]Can be overlaid on a "[/color][color=purple]4trk [/color]straight[color=#FFFF00]".[/color]
[color=#FFFF00]Can be overlaid on itself if rotated by 180°.
Lets trains switch lanes if they can overcome a 2000 pathfinder penalty.[/color]

12.label: robogrid (cheap)
12.description:
this one uses big-poles instead of substations.
harder to fully deconstruct, but more affordable.
[color=#ff2020]reminder[/color]: 
[color=#aa9900]map-wide loginet perpetrators will be persecuted.[/color]

13.label: robogrid
13.description:
[color=#ff2020]reminder[/color]: 
[color=#aa9900]if you see somebody deploying map-wide loginets, 
you are authorized to shoot them on sight.[/color]

15.label: [color=purple]4trk[/color] curve [color=red]FAST[/color] (read description before use)
15.description:
[color=red]- DO NOT OVERLAY EXISTING JUNCTIONS!
- DO NOT BRANCH OFF FROM THIS SECTION![/color]
[color=#FFFF00]- place this between close-by junctions to help trains maintain their momentum.[/color]

16.label: [color=purple]4trk [/color]straight [color=red]FAST[/color] (read description before use)
16.description:
[color=red]- DO NOT OVERLAY EXISTING JUNCTIONS!
- DO NOT BRANCH OFF FROM THIS SECTION![/color]
[color=#FFFF00]- place this between close-by junctions to help trains maintain their momentum.[/color]
